Module project.wgusoftware2project
Package project.wgusoftware2project.controllers

Class mainController

java.lang.Object
project.wgusoftware2project.controllers.mainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
mainController class created with initialization capabilities. The controller interfaces with the comboBoxes, labels, text fields, and buttons shown in main.fxml

  • Method Details

    • onLoginBtnClick

      void onLoginBtnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method is called if the Login button is clicked. The input userId and password are validated. If incorrect, a log file is updated with an unsuccessful entry and timestamp along with an alert displayed If correct, the log file is updated with a successful entry and timestamp The view is then changed to apptCustomer.fxml
      Parameters:
      event - The event of the Login Button being clicked
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      This method is called when the main.fxml file is loaded. The location TextField is updated to the system's default.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the relative path of the root object.
      resources - Resource used to localize the root object; can be null if absolute path.
